channel.title: Annoyed
channel.description: My house has been destroyed 3 times now. Then the spawn changed so I now spawn about 5 minutes away from my house. Now my beds aren't lettin me spawn there...

item.title: Annoyed
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“durial12, post:7, topic:390153”]Meeeeeh. Yes. BUT:

You could do it with CHESTS. Then nobody can destroy them. You would then need to make it so you cannot place 2 registered chests near each other.[/quote]
It’s the same problem, he’d still be able to protect an area. Also, on the server you can’t protect more than one chest.
